description: This file defines a custom web component 'todo-list' using LitElement, which manages and renders a list of todo items with styling and event handling.

classes.name: TodoList
classes.description: A LitElement-based web component that displays and manages a list of todo items, including styles, rendering logic, and event handling.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the todo list, including toggle-all checkbox and list of todo items.

methods.name: #onToggleAllChange
methods.description: Handles the change event for the toggle-all checkbox, dispatching a ToggleAllTodoEvent.
